name: arrayFindNoCase
description: These functions performs a case-insensitive search in the array for the specified value. Returns the array index of the first match; 0 if not found.

params.name: value or callback
params.description: The value you are looking for in the array.

examples.title: Find an "Apple" in an array of fruit
examples.description: Returns the index of the element "Apple" in the array

examples.title: arrayFind is not Case Sensitive
examples.description: Not case sensitive so "Apple" will be found in the array, returns 1. Use arrayFind for case sensitive matching.

examples.title: Member Functions: Find an "Apple" in an array of fruit
examples.description: Calls the findNoCase member function of the array object. Requires CF11+ or Lucee4.5+
